summary: Two weary travelers come upon a monastery. While staying the night, they learn of its mysterious founding.
cast: Tore Svennberg|Tora Teje|Richard Lund|Renée Björling|Emil Fjellström|Axel Nilsson|Yngve Nyqvist|Erik A. Petschler|Gustav Ranft|Gun Robertson|Albrecht Schmidt|Nils Tillberg|Jenny Tschernichin-Larsson
title: El monasterio de Sendomir
